channel.title: GUYS I FIGURED IT OUT! Tornado balence thing
channel.description:
Not a suggestion.
Ever wondered why you can't tornado the King dispite not actually interacting his immunitys?
It's because you are likely to redirect someone that should not be able to target the King to the King.
Such as the Knight, a Yolo Alch or any investigator. We can't have that happening.
